name: Simply Readable Wikipedia
description: Minor adjustments to the Wikipedia style to make it easier to read. Rather than a radical redesign, this overhaul is an attempt to maintain the spirit of the original design while improving typography, whitespace, and line-length to make long articles easier to read during extended sessions.
additional_info: 2015-12-13 - v0.01 - Initial upload. Still very much a work in progress! If you find articles with problems, let me know on Twitter @danherbert
